  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_2ab57abde3fdbdfea826fca049ea7b055b4b8ebe</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_2ab57abde3fdbdfea826fca049ea7b055b4b8ebe</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Expansion in solids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion in den Körpern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion en solides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão nos sólidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione in solidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση στα στερεά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión en sólidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that heat causes the solid particles to vibrate more strongly that the distances between them are increased.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solid particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Hitze die festen 
Partikel veranläßt, stärker zu vibrieren, daß die Abstände 
zwischen ihnen erhöht werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la chaleur fait 
vibrer les particules pleines plus fortement que les distances entre 
elles sont augmentées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o calor faz com que 
as partículas contínuas vibrem mais fortemente que as distâncias 
entre elas estão aumentadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il calore induce 
le particelle solide a vibrare più fortemente che le distanze fra 
loro sono aumentate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η θερμότητα αναγκάζει 
τα στερεά μόρια για να δονηθεί εντονότερα ότι οι αποστάσεις 
μεταξύ τους αυξάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el calor hace las 
partículas sólidas vibrar más fuertemente que las distancias entre 
ellas están aumentadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">feste Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erschütterung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">particules pleines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vibration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">partículas contínuas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vibração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">particelle solide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vibrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στερεά μόρια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δόνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">partículas sólidas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vibración</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
